signals.problem_statement: The customer is struggling to set up AI tagging and the thank you detector feature, which are not functioning as expected.
signals.context: Using Hiver since September with 5 inboxes and 3 team members.

signals.problem_statement: The customer cannot customize the fields when creating Asana tickets from Hiver, leading to inefficiencies in their workflow.
signals.suggested_solution: Integration with Zapier was considered as an alternative.
signals.context: Using Hiver to manage support tickets and integrate with Asana.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs to manually add the SRC number from Asana tasks when creating tickets in Hiver, which is cumbersome.
signals.context: Managing support tickets and tasks across Hiver and Asana.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants to automate replies for incoming emails to manage response times better, especially for technical issues.
signals.context: Handling technical support inquiries via email.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure if they are using Hiver to its full potential and is looking for guidance on best practices.
signals.context: Using Hiver for support management with a focus on maximizing efficiency.
